title: Planter, ca. 1880
markings: Marks: Impressed on underside of base: "MINTON / [date symbol for 1880] / 651 / 12."
dimensions:
25.5 x 37 cm (10 1/16 x 14 9/16 in.)
diameter at foot: 19 cm
creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Norton Spritz
description: Round cachepot, sides tapered toward base. Base and upper edge molded with browm-glazed bamboo motifs. Base with four feet; lip molding at sides to form handle, with bamboo moldings connecting lip and base. Outer body glazed deep blue, molded with raised foliage in green and with flowers in white. Interior and underside of base glazed bright pink-mauve.

tombstone.epitaph:
Planter, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. earthenware, glaze. Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Norton Spritz. 1991-152-1.
